txt.en: This outpost is much more worrisome than a mere band of robbers....
Brigands have returned to the Wold after having been recently driven across the Great River.
The brigands in the northern Wold seems overly confident despite their recent banishment by Utred and the Riders of Langhold.
The farmer indicated that the brigands may have wandered south-west from his farm after robbing him.\n\nYou should find the small band of brigands who robbed the farmer at dawn.

'A huge encampment of brigands, you say? This was no ordinary night raid, then....\n\n'Thank you for taking such a great risk in venturing into the fray, [placeholder]. I am sorry I chided you earlier and made light your courage. I think we must tell Thane Utred of this threat at once.'
The brigands of Eastmund's Lair in the northern Wold are of a hostile nature, and pose a threat to the upstanding folk of Langhold.\n\nYou should defeat many brigands in an effort to drive them out.
Dala can be found at the north gate of Langhold.\n\nYou should return to Dala.
'If you are in need of employ, there are some real brigands in need of banishment. Soldiers grown do not waste time with children's games that mimic the deeds of Men.'

'A huge encampment of brigands, you say? This was no ordinary night raid, then....\n\n'Thank you for taking such a great risk in venturing into the fray, [placeholder]. I am sorry I chided you earlier and made light your courage. I think we must tell Thane Utred of this threat at once.'
Dala can be found at the north gate of Langhold.\n\nYou should return to Dala.
Find the small band of brigands who robbed the farmer
Tell Dala of the brigand encampment that has emerged to the south-west
